text: Korean Hostel in Spain () is a South Korean variety show program on tvN starring Cha Seung-won, and Yoo Hae-jin. The show airs on tvN starting March 15, 2019. It is broadcast by tvN on Fridays at 19:10 (KST). == Synopsis == This is a show where the 3 casts will be running an alberge in Villafranca del Bierzo, Spain for the travelers to stay. In the hostel, they provide the travelers who came from their hikes at middle of the 800 km journey known as the Camino de Santiago a resting area and also food before setting off to continue their hikes. == Casts == *Cha Seung-won *Yoo Hae-jin * == Ratings == * In this table, represent the lowest ratings and represent the highest ratings. * Ratings listed below do not include commercial time, which regular ratings usually do. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! rowspan="3" | ! rowspan="3" |Original broadcast date ! colspan="2" |Average audience share |- ! colspan="2" |AGB Nielsen |- ! width="90" |Nationwide ! width="90" |Seoul |- !1 |March 15, 2019 |7.591% |9.133% |- !2 |March 22, 2019 |8.345% |9.568% |- !3 |March 29, 2019 |9.205% |10.195% |- !4 |April 5, 2019 |9.173% |9.851% |- !5 |April 12, 2019 |8.479% |8.723% |- !6 |April 19, 2019 |8.941% |9.407% |- !7 |April 26, 2019 | | |- !8 |May 3, 2019 |9.820% |10.994% |- !9 |May 10, 2019 |10.203% |10.543% |- !10 |May 17, 2019 |10.080% |11.228% |- !11 |May 24, 2019 | | |} == Feature == Yoo Hae-jin is in charge of cleaning and hostel manager. He is a versatile worker who also makes a variety of furniture with his excellent hand skills. Cha Seung-won is the main chef in hostel. is the assistant, who mainly helps out Cha Seung-won in the kitchen, with shopping, making coffee and so on. == References == == External links == * Official Website * tvN Asia Official Website Category:South Korean variety television shows Category:South Korean television shows Category:2019 South Korean television series debuts Category:TVN (South Korean TV channel) original programming Category:Korean-language television shows Category:2019 South Korean television series endings
